Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs

Class ProjectLevelVcsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.vcs.ProjectLevelVcsManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectLevelVcsManagerEx

    public abstract class ProjectLevelVcsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the version control systems used by a specific project.

      • getInstance

      • getInstanceChecked

        public static ProjectLevelVcsManager getInstanceChecked(Project project)
        Gets the instance of the component if the project wasn't disposed. If the project was disposed, throws ProcessCanceledException. Should only be used for calling from background threads (for example, committed changes refresh thread).

      • getVcsFor

        public abstract AbstractVcs getVcsFor(VirtualFile file)
        Returns the VCS managing the specified file.
        Returns:
        the VCS instance, or null if the file does not belong to any module or the module it belongs to is not under version control.

        Returns:

      • getVcsRootFor

        public abstract VirtualFile getVcsRootFor(VirtualFile file)
        Return the parent directory of the specified file which is mapped to a VCS.
        Returns:
        the root, or null if the specified file is not in a VCS-managed directory.

        Return the parent directory of the specified file path which is mapped to a VCS.
        Returns:
        the root, or null if the specified file is not in a VCS-managed directory.
